name: Book of SLam DarkLo
description:
A SLam DarkLo retrospective of pots influenced by his travels. The pots have sold for over $5,000 (virtual) each to AI bidders. This is your opportunity to collect the interactive book.

Swipe the pages, or use arrows to reveal the splendor of pattern, color and form hand sculpted by SLam in his mountain studio. The Book class is built in to the ZIM Framework by Dr Abstract. 

Dr Abstract is the inaugural member of the Gadget Minters. To find out more please visit https://zimjs.com/gadgetminters and https://zimjs.com/nft for info on making interactive NFTs with ZIM.
